description: This file implements a simple heuristic-based natural language understanding (NLU) reply function for a voice assistant chatbot, detecting greetings and help intents, and providing fallback echo responses.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] simple_nlu_reply(text: str)
methods.description: Returns a heuristic-based reply for the given input text, detecting greetings, help requests, or falling back to echo response.
